title: Asset Trading Volume (last 7 days)
label: Ecosystem
descriptionMd: Weekly Trading Volume and Average Price rank ships and claim stakes by total marketplace volume over the last 7 days, showing both traded amount and average execution price.
infoMd: Trading activity on the Galactic Marketplace reflects what players currently value and actively exchange. This chart shows the most-traded ships and claim stakes over the past week, ranked by total trading volume, alongside the average price at which each asset changed hands. By combining volume and average price, the data highlights not just which assets are popular, but whether activity is driven by high turnover, high valuations, or both—offering a clear snapshot of short-term market demand across ships and claim stakes.

title: ATLAS locker leaderboard
label: Tokenomics
description: ATLAS Locker Leaderboard ranks wallets by net ATLAS currently locked in the ATLAS Locker, based on cumulative deposits minus withdrawals.
infoMd:
Token locking reflects long-term conviction rather than short-term activity. This leaderboard ranks wallets by the amount of ATLAS currently locked in the ATLAS Locker, aggregating net deposits and withdrawals over time to show who has committed the most capital to locking.

By focusing on locked balances instead of transfers or trading volume, the chart highlights structural commitment to the ecosystem—separating wallets that actively stake or lock ATLAS from those that primarily hold or trade liquid balances.

title: POLIS locker leaderboard
label: Tokenomics
description: POLIS Locker Leaderboard ranks wallets by net POLIS currently locked in the POLIS Locker, based on cumulative locking activity.
infoMd:
Locking POLIS represents long-term governance alignment rather than short-term market activity. This leaderboard ranks wallets by the amount of POLIS currently locked in the POLIS Locker, accounting for net deposits and withdrawals over time.

By focusing on locked POLIS balances, the table highlights which participants have committed governance capital to the Star Atlas ecosystem, providing a clear view of where long-term voting power and strategic alignment are concentrated.
